description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is intended as an introduction to the field of human resources management. How a corporate fully utilizes its internal resources-employees, including their capabilities, knowledge, techniques, attitudes and motivation to fit its corporate competitive strategy. This course includes human resources analysis, strategy and targets, the access, development and reward of supportive operations, and the maintenance of human resources.

description.zh: 由於網際網路發達，現階段中大型之企業可利用網際網路進行跨國之虛擬工廠(Virtual Factory, VF)生產及全球運籌(Global Logistic, GL)管理以增加競爭力，此企業可稱之虛擬企業。虛擬工廠為虛擬企業之供應商，供應商與虛擬企業之內部資源與成本控管可由企業資源規劃(ERP)與產品資料管理(PDM)進行之; 虛擬企業與各供應商間以供應鍊管理(SCM)之手法相互配合;而供應商以顧客關係管理(CRM)之手法符合顧客需求與增加新顧客。本課程除了讓學生瞭解VF, GL, ERP, PDM, SCM與CRM之基本VE架構之外，更透過現今業界案例的研討與演練，藉以灌輸正確之虛擬企業管理觀念。
description.en: Global logistics trend to be the major strategy for enterprises all over the world. The global sites are located in the places that acquire the resource inexpensively and quickly. The CEOs can fully monitor the global sites virtually via internet and electrified techniques. This course presents the basic concepts of VF, ERP, SCM, PDM, CRM, and work-flow, which are the key factors of VE.

description.zh:
通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。
是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。
本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為人文科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover human science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在說明如何尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The goal of this course is to make student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, customer behavior, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

name.zh: 日本名家名著中譯賞析

description.zh: 車輛動力系統介紹，車輛耗能分析，動力系統之能源與動力單元(汽柴油引擎、替代燃料引擎、燃料電池、電力)，動力系統整車匹配。非傳統車輛動力系統：電動車、複合動力車、燃料電池車。
description.en: Introduction of Vehicle Power System, Energy Consumption Analysis, Energy Source and Power Unit (Gasoline and Diesel Engine, Alternative Fuel, Electricity), Vehicle Matching for Power System. Non-traditional Vehicle Power System: Electric Car, Hybrid Electric Vehicle, Fuel Cell Vehicle.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，包括一次及二次系統的設計考慮，配電變壓器的應用，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Planning and automation of power distribution systems, including system design considerations, power transformer applications, voltage and power loss and calculations, modulations of power supply, load analysis, and failure analysis.

description.zh:
本課程為講授鋼鐵製造原理與技術。內容分兩單元，一為生鐵之製
煉，另一為鋼之製煉。生鐵之製煉講述鐵礦石之還原反應及高爐操作之熱力學原理及其應用，以及高爐操作之技術發展。並介紹直接製鐵及溶融還原法之概要。鋼之製煉講述煉鋼之治金熱力學原理，並說明頂吹式純氧氣轉爐，底吹式純氧氣轉爐，頂底吹轉爐，電爐及平爐煉鋼法之冶煉技術。
description.en:
The course is to lecture the principle and technique of making ferrous products, its
content is divided into two parts, one is the refining of pig iron, the other is the
refining of steel. The former one is to describe the reduction reaction of ferrous
mine, and the thermal dynamics principle and application of a blast furnace, the
technique development of a blast furnace operation as well. The latter one is to
describe the metallurgical thermal dynamics principle of steel making, and to describe the smelting techniquesof the converter with pure oxgen infusing from upper part or bottom, electric furnace, open hearth.

description.zh:
本課程為結合現場技術實務與學理應用，使學習者瞭解山坡地開發利用之
                                         類別以及災害遣潛在的因素。並學習規劃設計植生綠化及邊坡穩定工程，
                                         以防止並控制不穩定的因素。
description.en: Introduction to Soil and Water Conservation.

description.zh: 1.原子及其結構 2.化學鍵 3.晶體結構原理 4.結構缺陷、成分與穩定性 5.鍵結與物理性質 6.晶體與光 7.氧化物晶體化學 8.矽酸鹽晶體化學 9.金屬晶體化學 10.高分子結晶化學
description.en: 1.Atoms and their structure 2.Chemicals bonds 3.Principles of crystal structures 4.Bonding and physical properties 5.Crystal defects、composition and stability 6.Crystal and light 7.Crystal chemistry of oxide 8.Crystal chemistry of silicate 9.Crystal chemistry of metal 10.Crystal chemistry of polymer

description.zh: 此課程之目的為介紹有關隧道工程之理論、設計與施工技術，其內容包括：緒論、初步分析與設計考慮因素、隧道與地下結構物載重分析、隧道斷面設計、隧道測量、隧道施工與設計、隧道之修理、管理與保養。
description.en: Introduction of basic theory of Tunneling  Engineering, design and construction techniques. Includes preliminary design & analysis, tunnelling & U/G structure loading analysis, cross-sectional design, maintenance.

description.zh:
1.醫用電子學之基礎。
2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。
3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。

5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。
6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。
7.生醫電訊號處理技術。
8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。
9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。
10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。
11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。
12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。

8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。
9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。
10.Designs of b

name.zh: 企業經營管理與財務管理

description.zh:
教學目標：企業經營管理之主要目的，在於選擇有利於企業經營基本的經營議題，並針對企業競爭力之相關要素，建構競爭優勢基礎要件，以達成企業經營目標。
課程綱要：
管理之重要性
策略之制定
競爭與合作下之經營模式
權益證券評價模式
負債證券評價模式
資本結構理論
投資專案評估
參考書籍：
(1) Ross,Thompson, Christensen, Westerfield and Jordon, 2004,"Fundamentals of Corporate Finance," 3rd ed.,McGraw Hill
(2) 謝劍平,財務管理--新觀念與本土化,智勝
(3) 李吉仁、陳振祥，2004，企業概論︰本質、系統、應用， 第二版，台北︰華泰文化出版公司
(4) Bartlett, Christopher A.; Sumantra Ghoshal; and Julian Birkinshaw. 2003. Transnational Management: Text, Cases, and Readings in Cross-Border Management. Boston: McGraw Hill. 。
成績考核：  分組報告30%,期中考30%.期末考40%
description.en:
【Course Plan】
Course Objective： The main purpose which enterprises manage, lie in choosing to help enterprises to deal in the basic management topic , and to the relevant key element of enterprise's competitiveness, build and construct the basic important document of the competition advantage , in order to reach enterprise's operations objective. 
Course Outline： 
Importance of Management
Setting-up for Strategy
Cooperation and Competition Business Model 
Valuation models of equity securities
Valuation models of debt securities
Capital structure theories
Valuation of investment project
Text & Reference Material：
(1) Ross,Thompson, Christensen, Westerfield and Jordon, 2004,"Fundamentals of Corporate Finance," 3rd ed.,McGraw Hill
(2) 謝劍平,財務管理--新觀念與本土化,智勝
(3) 李吉仁、陳振祥，2004，企業概論︰本質、系統、應用， 第二版，台北︰華泰文化出版公司
(4) Bartlett, Christopher A.; Sumantra Ghoshal; and Julian Birkinshaw. 2003. Transnational Management: Text, Cases,

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 廣義的法律包括憲法、法律、命令等。作為國家最高規範的憲法，其核心價值在於維護人性尊嚴；其所要保障的基本權（自由權、平等權、生存權、財產權、工作權……）、受益權、參政權、人格權等，均有賴相關法律的實踐方能落實。本課程主要在探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: Laws, if broadly defined, include constitutions, legal rules and orders. The Constitution--as the supreme norm of a country-have as its essence the preservation of human dignities. All the basic rights protected by the Constitution (such as the rights to freedom, equality, survival, properties and the possession of a job), the right to be benefited, the right to participate in politics and the right of humanity cannot be fully realized without the help of laws. This course focuses the discussions on constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 講述工業設計發展中近代設計課題，設計風格趨勢,著名設計師及以設計為導向的製造廠商的設計理念與實務，世界各種設計競賽,優良設計及評選,設計相關團體組織及著名設計學校介紹。
description.en: Talking about early man and his tools. Traditional handicrafts before the Industrial Revolution, then machines had taken place for manufecturing (Industrial Revolution), Wiliam Morris leaded Art and Craft Movement. Art Noureau     and Art Deco, the Bauhaus, Mass production and mass market, industrial design profession had started is the U.S. Industrial design up date etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.頻率響應分析，2.回授放大器，3.電路之穩定性分析，4.運算放大器，5.波形之合成與整形電路，6.濾波器，7.功率放大器。
description.en:
1.Frequency response 
2.Feedback amplifier
3.Stability analysis
4.Operational amplifier
5.Waveform generators and shaping 
6.Filter
7.Power amplifier

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹多媒體設計系統其中包括系統的操作技巧、運動與動畫製作技巧、互動與交談設計、軟體除錯與包裝、多媒體教材製作等相關技術。
description.en: This module is concerned with Multimedia Authoring Scripting and the use of Multimedia Development Tools and applying them in cross-platform multimedia production.  This course provides the student with a knowledge of the various concepts and techniques used in multimedia systems.

description.zh:
1.傅利葉轉換
2.離散及快速傅利葉轉換
3.IFR濾波器
4.FIR濾波器
5.專題
description.en:
1.Fourier Series and Transform
2.DDFT and FFT
3.IIR filter
4.FIR filter
5.Special projects

description.zh: 本課程以討論建築物有關的熱、通風、換氣、光、聲音等之物理問題。授課內容分為三大部分：第一部分關係室內氣候者如通風、換氣、隔熱等之方法以創造快適之室內氣候。第二部分與光學有關之日光照射、日光輻射、自然光之採集、人工光之應用。第三部分則為與聲音有關之室內音響狀態之改善及噪音之隔斷等。
本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en:
1.	Graphic standards for working drawing.
2.	Drawing preparation and process.
3.	Selected shop drawing
